instruction: 把所有 auto-coder.chat 改成 video-monkey.chat

conversations.content:
为了完成这个需求，我们需要修改多个文件中的内容。我会为每个需要更改的文件创建一个 *SEARCH/REPLACE block*。 1. 修改 `/Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/products_powerdby_autocoder/page.tsx`: ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/products_powerdby_autocoder/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH link: "https://auto-coder.chat" ======= link: "https://video-monkey.chat" >>>>>>> REPLACE ``` ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/products_powerdby_autocoder/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH Powered by auto-coder.chat

Showcasing innovative solutions developed using auto-coder.chat

======= Powered by video-monkey.chat

Showcasing innovative solutions developed using video-monkey.chat

>>>>>>> REPLACE ``` 2. 修改 `/Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/layout.tsx`: ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/layout.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH title: "auto-coder.chat", description: "chat with AI to generate code", ======= title: "video-monkey.chat", description: "chat with AI to generate video", >>>>>>> REPLACE ``` 3. 修改 `/Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx`: ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH Auto-Coder.Chat

AI-powered interactive coding assistant

======= Video-Monkey.Chat

AI-powered interactive video assistant

>>>>>>> REPLACE ``` ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH

1. Install Auto-Coder

pip install -U auto-coder
=======

1. Install Video-Monkey

pip install -U video-monkey
>>>>>>> REPLACE ``` ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH

2. Start interactive chat coding

$ cd your-project
$ auto-coder.chat =======

2. Start interactive video chat

$ cd your-project
$ video-monkey.chat >>>>>>> REPLACE ``` ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH ======= >>>>>>> REPLACE ``` ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH { title: "VSCode Plugin", description: "Integrate Auto-Coder with VSCode", href: "https://uelng8wukz.feishu.cn/wiki/XRFNwOt2miqefAk5R7acqRNfnOe", icon: "🧩" }, { title: "Products", description: "List of products developed using auto-coder.chat", href: "/products_powerdby_autocoder", icon: "��" }, ======= { title: "VSCode Plugin", description: "Integrate Video-Monkey with VSCode", href: "https://uelng8wukz.feishu.cn/wiki/XRFNwOt2miqefAk5R7acqRNfnOe", icon: "🧩" }, { title: "Products", description: "List of products developed using video-monkey.chat", href: "/products_powerdby_autocoder", icon: "🚀" }, >>>>>>> REPLACE ``` ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH

© 2024 Auto-Coder. All rights reserved.

=======

© 2024 Video-Monkey. All rights reserved.

>>>>>>> REPLACE ``` 4. 修改 `/Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/components/Header.tsx`: ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/components/Header.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH { name: "Products", items: ["Chat-Auto-Coder", "Web Typing Auto-Complete","Byzer-LLM", "Byzer-SQL","Byzer-Storage"], href: "/#" } ======= { name: "Products", items: ["Video-Monkey-Chat", "Web Typing Auto-Complete","Byzer-LLM", "Byzer-SQL","Byzer-Storage"], href: "/#" } >>>>>>> REPLACE ``` 这些更改应该涵盖了所有需要从 "auto-coder.chat" 更改为 "video-monkey.chat" 的地方。请注意，我们还调整了一些相关的描述，以更好地匹配 "video-monkey.chat" 的主题。如果还有其他需要修改的地方，请告诉我，我会继续帮助你进行更改。

instruction: 提供MacOS 两个下载链接: https://uelng8wukz.feishu.cn/wiki/O0EjwLuzgi7P41kFpE8ckLdwn2b#JiEEdwcbxokmZkxFuskc6eRXnne   https://uelng8wukz.feishu.cn/wiki/O0EjwLuzgi7P41kFpE8ckLdwn2b#JwandvYInogXZRx1DE0cqHcNnBf  第一个是 M系列,第二个是Intel 系列

conversations.content:
To implement this change, we need to modify the `/Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx` file. We'll update the "Download MacOS App" section to include both download links for M series and Intel series. Here's the *SEARCH/REPLACE* block to make this change: ```tsx ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH

2. Download MacOS App

=======

2. Download MacOS App

Download for M series Download for Intel series
>>>>>>> REPLACE ``` This change will add two download links for the MacOS app, one for M series and one for Intel series, within the existing section. The links are styled to fit the current design and will open in a new tab when clicked. Would you like me to explain or break down this code change?

instruction: 优化下页面的整体布局和风格,现代化并且下载按钮也更加符合常见形态

conversations.content:
好的,我理解您希望优化页面的整体布局和风格,使其更加现代化,并且改进下载按钮的设计。我会对主页 (page.tsx) 进行一些修改来实现这些改进。以下是相应的更改: ```typescript ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH import Link from 'next/link'; import Image from 'next/image'; export default function Home() { return (

instruction: 找个合适的地方注明该软件由 auto-coder.chat 开发

conversations.content:
为了注明该软件由 auto-coder.chat 开发，我们可以在页面底部的 footer 部分添加这个信息。我们将修改主页面文件 `page.tsx` 来实现这一点。这样，无论用户浏览网站的哪个页面，都能看到这个信息。 以下是需要进行的更改： ```python ##File: /Users/allwefantasy/apps/video-monkey.chat/app/page.tsx <<<<<<< SEARCH

© 2024 Video-Monkey. All rights reserved.

=======

© 2024 Video-Monkey. All rights reserved.

Developed with auto-coder.chat

>>>>>>> REPLACE ``` 这个更改会在页脚添加一行新的文本，注明该软件是由 auto-coder.chat 开发的。同时，我们还为 auto-coder.chat 添加了一个链接，让用户可以直接访问 auto-coder.chat 的网站。 这个修改保持了原有的页脚样式，同时在版权信息下方添加了开发信息。链接使用了蓝色，以便与页脚的白色文本区分开来，并在鼠标悬停时有颜色变化，提高了可交互性。 需要我解释这段代码或进行其他修改吗？
